ComicInfo.Summary:
It's all-out action in Athens, Greece as Bond and Blofeld's tenuous alliance is tested under fire! Can they survive the mountainside attack by upstart SPECTRE member Titania Jones...and can they survive each other? The double-crosses and triple-crosses hurtle toward a shocking and explosive conclusion in this penultimate issue!
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- A | Regular Cover | Butch Guice (a) & Ivan Nunes (c) | 1 | B/RI | 1:10 Retailer Incentive "Virgin Art" Edition Variant Cover | Butch Guice (a) & Ivan Nunes (c) | 2 | C/RI | 1:20 Retailer Incentive "Black & White Art" Edition Variant Cover | Butch Guice | 3 | D/RI | 1:25 Retailer Incentive "Virgin Black & White Art" Edition Variant Cover | Butch Guice | 4 | E/RE | Premium Variant Cover | Luca Casalanguida | 5 | F/FOC | 1:11 FOC "Black & White Art" Edition Variant Cover | Luca Casalanguida | 6 | G/FOC | 1:15 FOC "Virgin Black & White Art" Edition Variant Cover | Luca Casalanguida | 7 |
